artist: Artist: Unknown English, 17th century; Artist: Formerly attributed to Robert Nanteuil
inscription:
Inscriptions and Marks

on old mount, in pencil, LL: [Visscher]; along bottom edge: [A. Marvell?]; at LR: D29791
on verso, in pencil: [De Witt]
markings:
Watermark: not seen

recto, LL, stamped in black: CDG (Lugt 1145)
verso, stamped in black: I / A (Lugt 1405a)
provenance: Dr. C. D. Ginsburg, Lugt 1145 (1831-1914), Palmer's Green, England; Sir Bruce S. Ingram, Lugt 1405a, London ('until d. 1963); 'Mrs. D. H. Woodwarde, Brighton (until 1966; sold, October 11, to Colnaghi); [Colnaghi, London, 1966–67; sold, June 30, for £150, to MIA]
title: Portrait of a Man
